com.epam.finaltask.service

Class TopicService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.finaltask.service.AbstractService
      • com.epam.finaltask.service.TopicService

  • public class TopicService
extends AbstractService
    Service class that provides methods to add and manipulate database topics.

      • TopicService

        public TopicService(DaoFactory daoFactory,
                    ConnectionManagerFactory connectionManagerFactory)
        Creates TopicService with chosen DaoFactory and ConnectionManagerFactory implementations.
        Parameters:
        daoFactory - Factory that is used to create DAO objects
        connectionManagerFactory - Factory that is used to create AbstractConnectionManager subclass instances

      • TopicService

        public TopicService()
        Creates TopicService with with default DaoFactory and ConnectionManagerFactory defined in AbstractService no-arguments constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • closeTopic

        public boolean closeTopic(long topicId)
                   throws ServiceException
        Changes topic closed flag to true. Adds ApplicationConstants.TOPIC_CLOSE_RATING_BONUS to the accounts with type AccountType.ADMIN or AccountType.VOLUNTEER if they own message(s) in the topic and do not own the topic.
        Parameters:
        topicId - Id of the topic to close
        Returns:
        true if topic was successfully closed, else returns false
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • changeTopicHiddenState

        public boolean changeTopicHiddenState(long topicId,
                                      boolean hide)
                               throws ServiceException
        Sets topic hidden flag to the chosen value.
        Parameters:
        topicId - Id of the topic which flag should be set
        hide - State to set to the topic's hidden flag
        Returns:
        true if topic's hidden flag was set, else returns false
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • createTopic

        public boolean createTopic(Account account,
                           java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String text)
                    throws ServiceException
        Creates topic with chosen account, title and text and adds it to the database.
        Parameters:
        account - Account of the topic creator
        title - Title of the topic to create
        text - Text of the topic to create
        Returns:
        true if topic was successfully created and added to the database. Else returns null
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • findTopicById

        public Topic findTopicById(long topicId)
                    throws ServiceException
        Looks for topic in the database by title.
        Parameters:
        topicId - Id of the topic to look for
        Returns:
        Topic with chosen id, if it was found. Else returns null
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • findAllTopics

        public java.util.List<Topic> findAllTopics()
                                    throws ServiceException
        Returns all topics from the database sorted by date descending.
        Returns:
        All database topics sorted by date descending
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • findTopicsByTitleSubstring

        public java.util.List<Topic> findTopicsByTitleSubstring(Account sessionAccount,
                                                        java.lang.String searchString)
                                                 throws ServiceException
        Find topics by chosen substring. If sessionAccount's account type is AccountType.ADMIN or AccountType.VOLUNTEER, returns all topics, if AccountType.USER - returns only topics owned by session account, else returns empty list.
        Parameters:
        sessionAccount - Session account
        searchString - String that is used to find topics.
        Returns:
        If sessionAccount's account type is AccountType.ADMIN or AccountType.VOLUNTEER, returns all topics, if AccountType.USER - returns only topics owned by session account, else returns empty list.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • findTopicsByAuthorId

        public java.util.List<Topic> findTopicsByAuthorId(long authorId)
                                           throws ServiceException
        Finds all topics by authors Account id.
        Parameters:
        authorId - Id of the account
        Returns:
        List of topics with chosen author id
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If PersistenceException is thrown

      • provideAccountsToTopics

        private void provideAccountsToTopics(java.util.List<Topic> topics,
                                     AccountDao accountDao)
                              throws PersistenceException
        Finds accounts of topic authors and assigns them to topics.
        Parameters:
        topics - Topics which require account to be set
        accountDao - Dao that will be used to load accounts from the database
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - If PersistenceException is thrown while working with database

      • countTopics

        public int countTopics(boolean countHidden)
                throws ServiceException
        Counts all existing database topics.
        Parameters:
        countHidden - Determines if hidden topics will be counted
        Returns:
        Number of database topics
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If PersistenceException is thrown

      • findPageTopics

        public java.util.List<Topic> findPageTopics(int currentPage,
                                            int numberOfTopicsPerPage,
                                            boolean showHidden)
                                     throws ServiceException
        Finds topics on the chosen page sorted by date descending.
        Parameters:
        currentPage - Page from which topics will be taken
        numberOfTopicsPerPage - Number of topics on each page
        showHidden - Determines of hidden topics will be shown
        Returns:
        Topics from chosen page
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If PersistenceException is thrown
